node.title: 'Fairies' win fight with environmentalist, but learn a valuable lesson
node.alt: An image showing decorations on a bush track.
node.description: When fairy doors started appearing along a bush track in south-western Sydney, the local kids were enchanted and quickly joined in. Little did they know that they had just started.
node.content:
["When a neighbourhood war broke out in the suburbs of Sydney between\u00a0hundreds of citizens and\u00a0an environmentalist over a \"fairy glen\"\u00a0for children\u00a0during the greater metropolitan lockdown this year, the \"fairies\"\u00a0won, but lessons were learnt.", "In a bid to keep kids entertained without technology, families in\u00a0Holsworthy began to install fairy doors on trees across the bushwalking track in Harris Creek Reserve.", "\"The fairy doors really brought an element of delight to my daughter's day and were a little piece of magic in a really boring, tough and sad time,\" mother of three Cynthia Foote said.", "The project quickly gained popularity and the track was dubbed \"Fairy Glen\" as children came up with new\u00a0creations and decorations by the day.", "\"It was lovely to see our kids actually asking to go for walks outside to check out the doors and trees,\" Mrs Foote said.", "\"Being outside really opened their eyes to what is out there beyond their computer screens.", "", "
The fairy doors in Harris Creek Reserve were a way to encourage kids to step away from computer screens .(ABC Radio Sydney)
", "
Then the fight began
", "But Liverpool City Council\u00a0environment officer Alexi Gilchrist said the founders were unaware of the\u00a0harm to the trees and other vegetation in the area the fairy glen could potentially cause.", "\"Children were leaving plastic-type offerings made of materials such as small trinkets and plastic dolls around the installations,\" he said.", "", "
Many fairy doors were graffitied\u00a0with messages about environmental protection.(ABC Radio Sydney)
", "An anonymous environmentalist took matters into their own hands and apparently uprooted the installations.", "Many fairy doors were binned and graffitied\u00a0with messages about environmental protection such as \"air is precious\" and \"trees equal air\" in a call to \"dump the dumb fairy doors\".", "
'Sad and confused'
", "Mrs Foote said families involved with the project were devastated to discover the fate of their fairy glen.", "", "
Cynthia Foote said her children were devastated to find their doors\u00a0damaged.(Supplied: Cynthia Foote)
", "\"Everyone was flabbergasted at how someone could treat children that way,\" she said.", "\"The children were very sad and confused about why they lost their doors, and the parents were struggling to explain to them [the reason].\"", "The primary school teacher said\u00a0while she understood the objections, she did not agree with the environmentalist's style of combat.", "\"They are a passionate advocate for the environment,\" she said.", "
A teachable moment
", "A group of Holsworthy locals led by Mrs Foote and Eleanor Ericksson consulted Liverpool City Council on how to create a sustainable fairy glen.", "", "
Fairy doors and decorations can be found along the track in Harris Creek Reserve.(Supplied: Cynthia Foote)
", "\"Everyone now has to think very carefully about what kinds of materials they can use to make appropriate kinds of doors,\" Mrs Foote said", "Mrs Foote said the dialogue with ecologists\u00a0was a great opportunity to raise awareness of environmental conservation.", "\"This is a great chance for parents to explain why plastics and glitter are not good for the environment and educate their children about environmental protection.\"\u00a0", "
'Magic' here to stay
", "The group temporarily migrated the fairy doors to their private gardens from September 26, while gathering nearly 800 signatures in a petition to make the glen a permanent fixture in the reserve.", "", "
Charishma Kaliyanda tabled a motion to make the fairy glen a permanent fixture.(Supplied:\u00a0Charishma Kaliyanda)
", "Liverpool City councillor Charishma Kaliyanda tabled a motion calling for the council to officially recognise the project.", "\"The initiative really shows that magic can be found in our surroundings,\" she said.", "\"I saw in this initiative the ability for some of that magic to come back into being in the outdoors and connecting with our natural environment.", "At the council's October meeting the motion received unanimous support on the condition that contributors to the fairy glen abided by environmental guidelines.", "\"We look forward to helping bring the wonderment of the fairy glen to life in a way that is sustainable for many years to come,\" Liverpool City Mayor Wendy Waller said.", "\"It is a 'fairy tale' with a happy ending, as the 'magic' is here to stay but in an environmentally friendly way.\""]
